website_summaries.verdict: A modern electric blanket with updates that enhance comfort and safety, this blanket is the best deal available.
pros: Multiple heat settings and dual controls so bed partners can set their own temperature
cons: A bit pricier than competitors, but the features are worth it

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering a heated blanket by Sunbeam, I would recommended the Sunbeam Velvet Plush Heated Blanket over this model. This blanket has fabric which is not very soft and you can feel the heating elements. With the Velvet Plush model, the fabric is very very soft and you will not feel the heating elements. Will all models, even though there is a 5 year warranty, Sunbeam charges you shipping to their warehouse and may not be able to repair the blanket or return you a blanket in a different color. Read the warranty carefully.

customer_reviews.title: Expect it to stop working as a heated blanket and just become an ugly blanket with wires in it.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this broke within less than 3 months. When it worked, it worked well, but it just stopped heating out of both controllers one day. Didn't put it through the wash or anything. Just stopped. Tried taking it apart to test where it was broken but didn't get very far. . .Even if repaired wouldn't feel safe sleeping underneath it. I should have followed the other low star rating reviews. I thought - "No! not me, when I buy it it will be fine, they just got duds." Nope. Broken. No recourse.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I googled best electric blanket you can by and Amazon recommended the worst I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This product was the most I have ever paid for an electric blanket. Never put out very much heat even brand new. Died little by little over a 3 month period. I’ve had 15 dollar throws that were a better product. The cords with this blanket twist into knots almost immediately no matter how careful you are. Maybe mine was defective however the design of the cords is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Scodwell

customer_reviews.title: But boy do I love crawling into a warm bed on a cold night
customer_reviews.text: Wish you could put a timer on it and at the same time not have an automatic shut off time. But boy do I love crawling into a warm bed on a cold night! Update: It's not even 6 mths later and one half of the blanket doesn't work any longer. I'm so mad! I'm going to see about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Speed

customer_reviews.title: Careful to wash this...
customer_reviews.text: This one is a replacement...washed the first one per instructions and it didn't work after that....
customer_reviews.author: Kolorado Ken

customer_reviews.title: not nearly as warm as others UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. But we often have to check to see if it is even turned on. I would say it is only a few degrees warmer then it would normally be turned off. Most are very warm and you can run them at half temp. This one on high is what most are on 1 or 2. UPDATE Didnt even last 2 months. Now it barely warms at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Stuart

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: This blanket amplifies that feeling in the morning of being warm under your blanket and not wanting to get up. This thing literally just warms you up. Leaving at at 2-3 is usually enough to make me feel comfortable on a normal winter Cali night. The 10 setting I imagine would work well in even colder weather. If it's just you or your spouse, you can save money in that electric heater and just lay under this blanket. Blanket is nice and soft, just which it may be a little thicker or have some more weight? Just nitpicking at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Daddy Yambao

customer_reviews.title: A quality heated blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket heats evenly once it's properly set up. DO NOT use a power strip for the plug or you will find set up difficult (like I did). The plug must go directly into a wall socket. Wait until the blanket works properly before using the second plug in. The heating elements work well. Most users shouldn't be bothered with the automatic off feature after 10 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one use.
customer_reviews.text: Not soft, feels like a low quality dog blanket. Item performed correctly for one single use. The next use, I tried "resetting" it multiple times, and one of the controllers is still flashing, which signifies an electrical error. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: KLuna

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love heated blankets and mattress pads. These are soft and warm that give off an even heat weather soft or preheat the bed to crawl into on cold nights you just cant beat it! The material is so soft and thick I do not feel the wires. The controllers easy to use and stays on all night. The soft light is not distracting. I have been buying these for years. Every couple of years needed to buy new ones. They seem to just fail. This year seem different. Everything about them seems to be upgraded. I will keep my fingers crossed. They do come with a good warranty and I do recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect: exactly what you want
customer_reviews.text: After many years, my electric blanket quit. I agonized over what brand and the reliability of the blanket. Sunbeam has a good rep. I have owned sunbeam items before and was pleased with them. This blanket is baby soft, yet not flimsy ...a good weight for a blanket. It is easy to put together and nice and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: nygardener

customer_reviews.title: Control dial doesn’t light
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used electric heating blankets for years, several of this brand. My major complaint with this particular one I’d that only the on/off button light. The dial setting doesn’t so you can’t see what the setting is in the dark. Switched out the controls with an older blanket that has lit controls. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 Hours of heat???
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a heated blanket but mostly to warm the bed when we crawl into it. Once this blanket is turned on....it's on for 10 hours...unless you unplug it. Don't understand the concept of this and why it doesn't turn off. Once you turn the control on, the button flashes continuously, which is annoying. We're returning. Not worth it and 10 hours of heat is way too long.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last, product is cheap for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped functioning little after the return policy expired. For some reason this type expensive products don’t have longer periods of return. Product worked great for a month or so but right after that one is the controller stopped coming on, half of the blanket wouldn’t heat up. Then after the other controller comes on but the blanket won’t heat up at all. Recommendation, don’t buy it, I wasted $80 and now have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: This heated blanket works great. It was warm on its own I didn’t need to turn it on half the time. Unfortunately my Golden retriever chewed on the part that plugs into the blanket. I will have to order a new one. Only down fall was it had two controllers for heat setting which made it have allot of wires everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was in heaven for two weeks, then it just stopped working. It says its turned on, it was plugged in correctly, i did not wash it, and it just stayed folded on my bed. Im getting really mad at all these products being made so cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Updated——Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Update::: after 3 months and 3 days, one side stopped working. So I think with the price it cost me $20 a month. Not a happy camper. Working like it should. Although I’ve never had to have it above the “Low” setting. I’m sure that the “10” setting is for people living in Siberia without any other heat source.
customer_reviews.author: MyOtherNewName

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket while it worked. Didn't last a month.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. It was really nice while it worked. Gets really warm (too warm for me, just right for my girlfriend) if you turn it all the way up, but on low there's just a bit of warmth. Nice range of temperatures, and soft. Sadly, one of the zones stopped working about a month in, and the other quit on us about a month later. We don't use it all that much, so we were surprised it stopped working so quickly. I'm not sure if I got a bad one or if this is typical, but I'll be going elsewhere for my next heated blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M Lucas

customer_reviews.title: The blanket's heating ability doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blanket for about 9 months. It barely heats up at all any more, even on a high setting. At first it really did work well. I contacted Sunbeam a few days ago about the issue. They never responded. The blanket itself if nice, but it has a bunch of useless cords in it, so I feel like tossing it out.
customer_reviews.author: KayD.

customer_reviews.title: Blanket started tripping the breaker
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had posted this but it's still relevant 9 mos later. We ordered this blanket Dec 8, 2019. The windows for returns ended Jan 31, 2020. The blanket started tripping the breaker in February. The blanket was plugged directly into a wall outlet. It was not plugged into an extension cord. Due to short window for returns we have no opportunity to receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not so great of durability
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall comfort however the high level heating lasted about 5 weeks. The heating element produces a medium heat on the highest level. Not sure what to do about this since my purchase was in March 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: So Fa, So Great
customer_reviews.text: It's new so I can't comment on durability but it is soft, I have washed it and it's still great, it puts out a lot of heat at the top end I learned the first cold night I didn't need to go over 5. I do wish the numbers and arrow were backlit for use in the dark but at this price, I shouldn't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dietzel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped heating after about 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Blanket stopped heating after about 6 weeks, just after the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Huff

customer_reviews.title: It only lasts about a year
customer_reviews.text: I live in a cold state so at first this blanket really delivered. After about a year, it quit on one side. It went a few more months before it totally quit on the other side. One fellow described this blanket as an ugly blanket with wires running through it. It is poorly made and I have been looking for an electric blanket that is NOT Sunbeam. I don't trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: llamallynn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a worthless blanket, has 10 heat settings, none work, i though sunbeam was supposed to be a great company but with this heated blanket, i do not think so. There is no heat input at all, no heat distribution, i will never buy another blanket of any type from you and i thought biddeford was awful but not as awful as this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Millard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before purchasing, should have paid closer attention. When I put it on my bed it fit well. First night I used it, it got very warm on low. Second and third night same thing. Fourth night it didn’t work at all. Controls were flashing. Did what I was told to reset it. Nothing worked all 3 times I tried. Notified Sunbeam, got the standard email back. Waited 2 weeks, no further reply. Notified amazon. They will issue a refund as soon as I send it back:
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ashurst

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this blanket for my daughter. By the end of May it no longer heated up. All it is now is a regular blanket. I am so disappointed. My daughter gets so cold and I wanted to get her a nice blanket and I thought Sunbeam was a great name but now I know it is not. I got the extended warranty and I tried to call and use it but they said that the manufacturer warranty had to go first. I don't know how to get the manufacturer warranty because she got rid of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kash

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: Used this for about 18 months. It still works but the light on the one dialer stopped working after only 3 months. When the timer shut it off, sometimes I had to turn the button off and on again twice to get it to reset. I like the extra fleece lining. It makes it softer so you don't feel the wires as much as a regular blanket.
customer_reviews.author: k laputka

customer_reviews.title: Blanket only heats on one side now.sunbeam heated throw also stopped heating after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased End of Nov. 2017. Blanket was lightweight, wires not very intrusive, soft feel. Satisfied with product until 3 months later when heat was not working properly. Had to keep turning control up to 8 to get same heat as 2 previously. Heating ability is greatly diminished. Control dial is stubborn to turn, which may be problem for people with arthritis. Am extremely disappointed in the decreased heating of this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: carol griffen

customer_reviews.title: Is this product any good ???
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully Sunbeam products are still good . Wife keeps killing cheep electric blankets . Got it as a gift for her . Not to scratchy of mental . Unlike the older ones from years ago . Kids jumping on it constantly . Blanket on 24/7 and it never gets a brake . Wife is always cold. Haven't washed it yet.If its anything like the old blankets from years ago . It will survive multiple washings . Duel control is nice also on the queen size blanket . Got your three year warranty just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Road Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best electric blanket I've ever used ☺. Most of them are too heavy and get too hot. This one is lightweight and the temperature controls are really accurate. From the beginning, my husband and I were happy with this blanket. Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: LBCULP

customer_reviews.title: Great Blankie!
customer_reviews.text: At 5+ heat setting I was sweating. This has a timer on it so it automatically shuts off. It heats up fast. The material has some thickness to it which is a pleasant change from most modern blankets. It is nice and soft, too. If you are looking to buy an electric blanket, this is the one I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hall

customer_reviews.title: Two controllers, lots of wires, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have this neated blanket on top of a comforter, which is on top of a top sheet, and I usually keep it on it's lowest setting at night. The blanket has two controllers that have to attach to the blanket at the same time. It's a cool feature so two people can each have their own heat setting. However, some people may find the extra wires to be annoying. Running the wires under the bed seems to keep them out of the way though.
customer_reviews.author: MDB

customer_reviews.title: How long will it work? That’s the question.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped heating on one side during the first winter we had it. Didn’t even make one full Minnesotan winter. I got a micro plush one in the same brand and it at least made it one full winter. I’m going to go with it was a fluke as the second one I got (same brand just different blanket material) has been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  What a great blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a heated blanket. I am excited to say that this one is a winner. It’s soft and warm. If I want to toast myself and my pets I can crank up the heat. The only problem is that I didn’t buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. PoppeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my husband and he loves it. I see that electric blankets seem to have a high failure rate, e.g. controls quit, half the blanket stops working, etc. It's early so this remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but not great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this heated blanket to replace our other Sunbeam heated blanket. Our pup got under the bed and chewed through the cord of the old one. The new one is adequate but is nowhere near as nice as the old one. The fabric is a bit rough and the heat is not consistent. But it's still nice to crawl into a warm bed on a cold winter night!
customer_reviews.author: EBeth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This blanket lasted four months. Not even long enough to get through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: MegB

customer_reviews.title: Great decision...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering this product and looked around at like blankets in local stores before deciding to trust the other customer ratings I read. The price point was also too good to pass up. I figured if it didn't work I would simply return it to Amazon. I am so glad I purchased this blanket! It is warm and layers perfectly under my existing bedding. The auto shut off feature, many levels of heat, and dual controllers are wonderful benefits. I highly recommend it. I am ready for old man winter now.
customer_reviews.author: JzGma

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got a basic one from the same makers years ago and it really didn’t work well and the reason i can say that is because this heated blanket is the real deal and gets atleast double as hot as the pos I had before
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Leizear II

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade to your bed during winter!
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is perfect for those cold winter nights. You can turn it on 20 minutes before gong to bed that way you don’t have to crawl onto a cold mattress. It gets pretty hot in the number 10 setting. I kept mine in number 5.
customer_reviews.author: Mario9587

customer_reviews.title: The fleece too thin!
customer_reviews.text: The fleece does not hide the discomfort of the heating wires....too thin layer of fleece, thus the heating wires easily felt through the bed sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Eaglesoaring Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Got a couple of these for my kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughters wanted an electric blanket - these are fantastic. Heats up quickly, warms but doesn't burn. The blanket is soft and easy to operate - the two control model is fantastic for a larger bed. My kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: startingfresh72

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Every night I turn it on thinking "maybe it will work". And it never does. Totally not worth the effort to repair it. Run away from this product - it's the only way you're going to get warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, bad control
customer_reviews.text: After using this blanket for few days one of the control started to blink. According to the manual blinking light on control is not normal. so I returned this one and got an exact replacement blanket. But after using the replacement blanket for few days the same problem happened. Light on control started blinking. So I returned the replacement blanket and bought another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Tse

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 6 months ago. At first, I was pleased with the heat level. The bed was toasty warm on cold nights. Now, 6 months later, the blanket is barely warm even on the highest setting. We tried resetting by plugging and unplugging but that didn't work. In addition, the dial is hard to turn to raise or lower temperature. Overall, A lousy purchase for the money. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Domenica  Genovese

customer_reviews.title: Electric blanket that is more than warm
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is on steroids. It warms up fast, but i can set it at 1....anything higher would be way too warm. I wish it would heat to 1/2 the temp it does when set at 1. It is perfect in all other aspects.
customer_reviews.author: S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this!!!! Mine stopped working one day after the return period ended (30 days). It never really distributed heat evenly. I'm SO upset and I can't afford a replacement. This is SUCH a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: ohchrissy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. It absolutely doesn’t heat up hardly at all. In fact I can’t really even tell it’s on. The on off button just keeps flashing and won’t turn off. (I have no idea if it’s supposed to do that or not because the instructions don’t say anything about it. I’m sending it back! Terrible. Maybe I have a bad one or something.
customer_reviews.author: Rafflesgirl

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Mine only works for a little while then one side shuts down and the controller starts blinking
customer_reviews.author: Ray-ray

customer_reviews.title: OMG!  THIS IS THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why I didnt get this sooner! This blanket is the business! The fabric is soft, the level of warm is all over and it's works! I'm very, very pleased with this. I think I may order another for a christmas gift for the winter, because this will work for those freezing days!
customer_reviews.author: Nekell Jarmon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heated blanket for "my side"of the bed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heated blanket for "my side"of the bed. Haha! Does have difficulties always working - not 100% happy with the "non-working" moments. So far it has turned back on. Will be sad when it doesn't want to come back on when I want to get warm.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Wistrom

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6-7 months but now an entire section of the blanket doesn’t heat up, despite being turned on high. Disappointing, as this was one of my favorite blankets in the winter! Now the bottom/middle of the blanket is nice and warm and the middle/top provides no heat!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Jfe

customer_reviews.title: yucky
customer_reviews.text: It's an electric blanket that I use year round because of health problems, mine broke so I had to get one fast. The color is hideous, and fabric is scratchy and thin. But it gets toasty.
customer_reviews.author: jkempTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Sunbeam Quilted Fleece Heated Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this blanket. I have hesitated to say anything, because I didn't know if anything could be done. I live in a very cold climate and I can turn the blanket on an hour before bedtime and my bed is still freezing when I climb in. The blanket also turns itself off and it's not the 10 hour shutoff. Now I can feel the very bottom of the bed is warm, but nothing else it. I need a new blanket. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Black

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my husband and me and I love it. Dual controls work perfectly. I like it cooler and my husband likes it hot so the dual controls are a must. Ordered one for each of our adult kids for Christmas I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on a blanket that only gets lukewarm
customer_reviews.text: This blanket has not heated up right since the first day I plugged it in. I wanted a blanket to warm me up. This blanket barely takes the chill off. I purchased it in October and just started using it in November. Of course I missed the return window so it looks like I’m stuck with it. The only nice thing about it is that it’s soft.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Coley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I like this blanket, but not the controller. It is very hard to see what temperatureThe blanket is on as it does not lite up. Also hard to tell if the blanket is on or off as that light is very dim. The third thing I don't like is it does not shut off after 10 hours, even though it states on the controller that it does.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Nyhan

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket stopped working after one month, literally one day after the 30 day return policy. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Present in Recent Memory
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's bedroom is a bit colder than the rest of the house in winter. She and "Duke" the chihuahua really appreciated the addition of this electric blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, tons of heat.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, each control operates a different side of the blanket. We put it under a blanket and then lie on that. I've never gone above the 3 setting while my wife has used 5. So if you're like us and one is always too hot and the other too cold while sleeping, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Zainen Galerion

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: This blanket didn't last a month. It never got as hot as our electric throw blanket. I bought 2 and neither one worked! I would not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T.

customer_reviews.title: Love my electric blanket on a cold night.
customer_reviews.text: I'm single and sleep by myself. this blanket is great. I turn my heat off at night so a few weeks ago when I got up and it was 41 degrees in my bedroom I decided to get an electric blanket. This fit the bill perfectly. It has dual zone adjust. And shuts off after 10 hours. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Level is High
customer_reviews.text: At eighty I have bones and joints that give me a lot of trouble. This blanket was one of the best buys I've ever made as it keeps the pain down while it warms my body as well as my spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Marysdude

customer_reviews.title: Hot Stuff
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the damned thing gets too hot! Even when set at 1 it’s almost too hot. If set at, say, 4 it will roast you alive. Way too hot. Aside from the searing heat it’s comfortable and the material is soft enough.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Vellini

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Only one side heats up. Still sitting in the box collecting dust. But I am not too hear broken because it’s not a soft one. It’s the kind you put under the sheet to warm the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Podshibyakina

customer_reviews.title: Boy this is a hot blanket
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife. I’m glad it has two zones that you can adjust because she likes her side HOT and don’t. This is really great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not soft!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket does what it’s made to do, but it is VERY thin, and not soft at all. It wasn’t what I thought I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. Doesn't get too hot. Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Doesn't get too hot. Does the job. The instructions are stupid, so one point lost for making me have to study too hard to operate. But once I figured it out, it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I would recommend this product to anybody so I really enjoyed it works very well so good product thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Though the mushroom appears as grey in the listing, this blanket is BROWN!
customer_reviews.text: Mushroom color shown in the item description appears quite grey, but this blanket is BROWN. That said, I am reasonably confident a Sunbeam electric blanket product will perform satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: marcusli55

customer_reviews.title: Great heating blacket
customer_reviews.text: I love my heated blanket. I live in Indiana and the weather is crazy here. I have dual controls which is great for when my daughter sleeps over.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn’t sure what to think of the fleece but now I absolutely love it. It really keeps out the cold.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nhuc

customer_reviews.title: Great item to keep warm
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job. Just remember-the queen has two controls on the blanket. Good for two persons sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew w Greene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect conrols
customer_reviews.text: Can you believe this has two controls? Amazing. I put both on #3 an doubled it and I am toasty--not too hot--not cold and it is freezing outside. I will sleep well tonight. The quality + value= success
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was great in letting me return it though
customer_reviews.text: Received it, washed it by hand (and nightmarishly dried for HOURS by squeezing out water as gently as I could for HOURS, and let it hang dry). Then found out it didn't even work when I plugged it in. Returned it. Not bothering trying another kind. Amazon was great in letting me return it though.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I am always concern about the safety of cleaning/washing electric blankets. Because of the heating coils inside the blanket, I am afraid to wash it. The manufacturer does not provide good advice on cleaning. They just say what you should not do to clean it. Usually, the heating coils stop heating and I buy another. I buy a new one every year. There should be an economically quality blanket on the market that works for multiple years/winters. I hope this brand is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical sunbeam quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this a couple nights but good blanket so far. Easy to set up. Not super soft but it sits between my sheets and duvet so it doesn’t really matter. Just wish it had a preheat option. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin fleece
customer_reviews.text: The heated blanket has 2-controls. The material is a thin fleece. I'm not real confident on how strong the fabric would be with normal, nightly use. I'm using it in our guest bedroom, over a sheet and another thin blanket, and it works fine. The controller's instructions were clearly stated. We used the Low setting and it took the air-conditioned chill away perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PMcL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and not heavy. My Mother loved it!!! She is 92 years old, and she should surely know. I highly recommend this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Nuclear description
customer_reviews.text: Web site not exactly clear on size. Cords in a weird spot it is being returned
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Gwynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Warmth
customer_reviews.text: This is a warm blanket be sure to start at the lower settings and work your way up
customer_reviews.author: Good Guy

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: So wonderfully warm since my husband likes to leave the window partially opened. It automatically shuts off after 10 hours. Dual controls too.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered a smaller size ...too big for just 1 person that needs heat
customer_reviews.author: dltmusic

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold nights
customer_reviews.text: I like the material used, and I don't really notice the heating elements inside if I decide to wrap myself like a burrito. The only personal con I have with this is that each side of the blanket is independently controlled.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: it lasted halfway thru the winter, after awhile it ...
customer_reviews.text: it lasted halfway thru the winter, after awhile it was just barely working, it would be warm for about I hour and after that, I would have to unplug then plug it back in after a few days I gave up and went and bought me one from bed bath and beyond
customer_reviews.author: Jim England

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: We've had this blanket about a year now, it works well, heats up fast , and is very comfortable. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Buxx

customer_reviews.title: GREAT blanket!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my new heated blanket! It kept me nice & toasty last night! I did lots of research before buying a heated blanket & this is the one I decided to go with and I'm glad i did! The remote wires is a bit of a pain only bcuz they get tangled easily. There are 2 remotes & each one has 2 wires coming out of it. Other then that the blanket keeps you nice and warm & the remotes don't get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket, Keeps us nice and toasty. I checked all over and this was the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Judy W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket. Like all other electric blankets it only lasts one season.
customer_reviews.author: mando

customer_reviews.title: Well made and perfect heat blanket
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft blanket with dual heating zones.....well made very nice
customer_reviews.author: Paul inbody

customer_reviews.title: Saving me lots of money and complaints!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is saving me lots of money by allowing me to turn the heat down at night. My fiancé likes it warm and I like it cool. This has dual temperature controllers and you can set one side to 10 and the other to 1 (or off completely) to allow for dissimilar temperature preferences. One the highest setting this thing will pump out considerable heat - unbearably hot after about 5 minutes. I usually turn it on to the medium setting (5/10) about 5-10 minutes before I get into bed to take the chill off the bed (so I'm not getting into a cold bed) and then turn it off as soon as I'm getting into bed. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Good blanket!
customer_reviews.text: We live at 7,500 ft., and it's really nice to have a really warm bed! You can turn it up at first, and it does warm up real well. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: LOVIN IT!
customer_reviews.text: TURN IT ON, HOP IN AND SNUGGLE UP! GREAT! GREAT! GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: NANA5

customer_reviews.title: Best one my wife has ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best one my wife has ever used... She loves it!!!!! She always fights keeping warm, so we double this under her side of the bed so she has two hearing blanks and thank God , I have none.. CMT patient.. Her body doesn't have good circulation, so once she gets cold , very hard for her to get warm again..
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: works too well
customer_reviews.text: I think this blanket works well by itself. I think if you don't turn on your heat and it's below freezing, you may need to plug the blank in otherwise it works very well without electricity.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Warm and soft
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my grandpa who has cancer. Kept him nice and warm. I liked the timer on it.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Warm as toast!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, heat is deceiving. Comes on slowly, but is more than you will need, even at a low setting g of 2 or 3. Heat scale goes up to 10, but would make you a piece of toast if set over 3-4. I am happy with my purchase. A good way to conserve on you heating bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely died after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I read similar reviews about this blanket kicking the can after a short period of time. I figured "what are the odds?" Well, the odds are pretty good that this blanket is a piece of crap. Do not buy! This was delivered late December 2016 and one side stopped working after 7 weeks and the other stopped after 12 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Omar B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The heat isn’t well distributed and does not warm my legs. I am disappointed. I would not recommend this blanket
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Searls

product_meta.title: Sunbeam Heated Blanket | 10 Heat Settings, Quilted Fleece, Mushroom, Queen - BSF9GQS-R772-13A00
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:MushroomClimb into your toasty bed and sleep soundly in quilted fleece softness. The exclusive Thermofine warming system senses and adjusts temperature to deliver.
feature_bullets: Dual EasySet Pro Controller with 10 heat settings and 10-hour auto-off function
Senses and adjusts to deliver consistent warmth
